name: SAPlusMobileSDK
summary: Simplifies secure user authentication for iOS apps using SIM-based and SMS OTP authentication via mobile networks.
description: The Silent Authentication+ SDK for iOS library is designed to make authenticating users within an iOS application a seamless and secure process by leveraging the same security mechanisms utilized by mobile telecommunications providers. This SDK makes it easy for iOS app developers to request Silent Authentication (with or without additional pre-checks), issue SMS one-time passwords (OTPs), reissue SMS OTPs, and verify SMS OTPs.
